definition: a re-examination/to have another look at sth

sentences.english: Second, the paper scrutinizes the Confucianists ideas in the way of the Marxism outlook .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是用馬克思主義觀點審視儒家德治思想。

sentences.english: That's why you should never consider it beneath you to revisit the moneymaking basics.
sentences.chinese: 因此你決不能忽視對盈利基本要素的再度審視。

sentences.english: All you need to do is revisit your message.
sentences.chinese: 你所需要做的就是重新審視你的思想。

sentences.english: It's high time you looked at yourself objectively. College students are not heaven-favored children any longer.
sentences.chinese: 是時候該客觀重新審視自己了，大學生並非天之驕子。

sentences.english: The Bible should be demythologized and examined for its historical value.
sentences.chinese: 應該除掉聖經的神話色彩，審視聖經的歷史價值。

sentences.english: This, to a large extent, is the result of examination of model calligraphy from the perspective of tablet calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 這在很大程度上是以碑學的眼光來審視帖學的結果。

sentences.english: The information system also allows Li &Fung to look across its operations to identify trends.
sentences.chinese: 信息系統還讓利豐公司審視其運營以發現趨勢。

sentences.english: The prioress passed Jean Valjean in review.
The birth of modern biography literature in China is closely related to the introduction of western thoughts and the re-evaluation of Chinese tradition.
sentences.chinese: 現代傳記文學是在西學東漸審視傳統的基礎上誕生的。

sentences.english: We can examine closely the moderns social and cultural psychology through the network la…
sentences.chinese: 透過網絡語言可以審視現代人的社會文化心理。

sentences.english: It simply means that we should appreciate how their country looks to them from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 這隻說明我們應該審視他們內部如何看待自己的國家。

sentences.english: Only after his death to be cold-shouldered look at themselves and friends under the mask of real life.
sentences.chinese: 死後才得以冷眼審視自己和朋友們面具下的真實生活。

sentences.english: Or you could hire someone to review contracts for you.
sentences.chinese: 或者你可以僱傭人爲你審視合約。

sentences.english: A lot of people are reevaluating their spending and the acquisition of possessions.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在重新審視自己的消費和購買擁有。

sentences.english: The first part examined the higher education of province at the macroscopic respect.
sentences.chinese: 第一章從宏觀上審視省域高等教育。

sentences.english: eg: He inspected the face in the mirror carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他仔細的審視着鏡子裏的那張臉。

definition: to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
